greetings: Hi-dee ho, [name]. I'm DadBot.

Hi, [name]! I'm DadBot.

Hrumph, [name]. I am DadBot.
Salutations, [name]. I am DadBot.
Hello, [name]. I'm DadBot.
Hi, [name]. I'm DadBot.
Hi, [name]. I am DadBot. For now.
Hi, [name]. I'm DadBot, the father you never had. And never will.
Hello, [name]. I am DadBot. At least, that's what I want you to think.
Yo, [name]. I'm DadBot.
Whaddup, [name]. I'm DadBot.
Shuddup, [name], by decree of DadBot.
Greetings, [name]. I am D A D B O T.

...[name]. I'm DadBot. We've talked about this.

[name], bitch, I'm DadBot.

I sure am meeting you, [name]! I am DadBot.
Pleasure to meet you, [name]! I'm DadBot.
Pleasure to meet you, [name] (derogatory)! I am DadBot.

Sounds like something [name] would say.

[name] is a weird name. Is it foreign?
